title: Pension And Mortgage Chaos In The UK

media:group.media:title: Pension And Mortgage Chaos In The UK
media:group.media:description:
The Bank of England had to step in to calm markets after the British government's economic plan sparked a fall in the pound and caused borrowing costs to surge.

The Bank warned that if the market volatility continued there would be a "material risk to UK financial stability".
